input_email_body:
Subject: Report of Media Data Interruption Error During System Update

I am writing to report an error with media data interruption that occurred during a system update You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. This error might be caused by an insufficient firewall configuration. I have tried restarting the system and updating the firewall rules, but the error persists. I would appreciate it if you could urgently investigate this matter and provide a solution to prevent further media data interruptions. My name is John Doe.
